author: venu
msg: Description : Throw NAMESPACE_ERR: when namespace uri is null and qname has a prefix.

author: venu
msg: Description : Methods setIdAttribute(), setIdAttributeNS() should  throw NOT_FOUND_ERR instead of NullPointerException when attributes are not found.

author: mrglavas
msg: Support printing of XML 1.1 documents, comments, and print space and end of line characters appearing in content so that they can be roundtripped.
Fixed a bug with printing null system IDs in DOCTYPE.

author: mrglavas
msg: Support printing of XML 1.1 documents, CDATA sections, and print space and end of line characters appearing in content so that they can be roundtripped.
Fixed a bug with escaping characters in comments.

author: mrglavas
msg: The rawname parameter in some error messages was null because the variable was only set if the DTD validator was removed from the pipeline.
